com.koalog.util.swing
Class ApplicationLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.swing.ApplicationLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
public class ApplicationLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

An application generator. From an XML file, this utility generate the most common elements of an application.

createApplication

public void createApplication(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                       throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create or update an application. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Title: the title key of the application.
The following attributes are optional:
  • Bundle: the name of the resource bundle used by the application.
  • Icon: the icon of the application.

Parameters:
atts - The XML element attributes.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen

createAction

public void createAction(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create or update an action. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Name: the unique identifier of the action, also used as the key for the action name;
  • Class: the action class name.
The following attributes are optional:
  • Mnemonic: the key used to access the action from its context. The code key is built using the KeyStroke class from the specified string. It is thus case sensitive and upper case letters should be used to refer to the letter keys;
  • Accelerator: a key combination to invoke the action from anywhere in the application. The syntax for the key combination is the one defined in the KeyStroke class. In particular, letters should be upper case and the name of the control keys should be lower case;
  • Enabled: indicate the initial state of the action - enabled or disabled. Use the valuestrue and false.

Parameters:
atts - The XML element attributes.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen

createActionParam

public void createActionParam(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                       throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create or update an action. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Key: the key of the action parameter to set;
  • Value: the value of the parameter.

Parameters:
atts - The XML element attributes.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen

createMenu

public void createMenu(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create or update a menu. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Name: the key for the menu name;
The following attributes are optional:
  • Mnemonic: the key used to access the action from its context. The code key is built using the KeyStroke class from the specified string. It is thus case sensitive and upper case letters should be used to refer to the letter keys.

Parameters:
atts - The XML element attributes.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen

createMenuItem

public void createMenuItem(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                    throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create or update a menu item. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Action: the key of the action associated to this menu item. It is the action that holds all the information for the menu item representation on the screen.

Parameters:
atts - The XML element attributes.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen

createCloseHook

public void createCloseHook(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                     throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Create a hook to the window close icon. The following attributes are mandatory:
  • Action: the key of the action executed when closing the window.

Usually, the window close hook will be an action that will issue an action event commanding the application to exit. It seems unsecure to exit from the hook itself, except if it's an application specific hook.

Parameters:
atts - the attributes
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - should not happen
